explains: n. 教友派信徒；贵格会教徒

sentences.en: Here Wulf probably overstates Quaker schools' impact.
sentences.cn: 在这方面，伍尔夫可能夸大了贵格会学校的影响。

sentences.en: Quaker schools probably cannot be credited with instilling these ideas in the lower classes.
sentences.cn: 这些观念在下层阶级中逐渐灌输，也许不能归功于贵格会学校。

sentences.en: In 1765, the year Wulf uses to demonstrate the diversity of Philadelphia's Quaker schools, 128 students enrolled in these schools.
sentences.cn: 1765年，伍尔夫用这一年来展示费城贵格会学校的多样性，这些学校招收了128名学生。
